condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(CE_Scope_Choices)*>,HW/SW + LABOR),[EQ](<*VALUE(Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?)*>,Yes))
name: SII_DDS_Terminal_Svr1
action: [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(Number of Terminal Server Interface Types)*>,0)){<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Detail Design Specification -Terminal Svr1:<* Eval(16 * 0.9 + (<*VALUE(Number of Terminal Server Interface Types)*> - 1 ) * 4 *0.9) *>)*>}{<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII Detail Design Specification -Terminal Svr1:0)*>}[ENDIF]
description:
SII Detail Design Specification -Terminal Svr1

Calculated Hrs =If tst > 0 then  
Hrs = 16*0.9 + (tst-1)*4*0.9 
Else Hrs = 0
